name: Elementrees
description:
Top-down Tower defense Shooter. Protect the elemental trees and use their powers to vanquish the evil lord.

We are a team of students from France and made this game under 72h for the 46th edition of the Ludum Dare Game Jam !

This game is all about managing the environment with elements ! You control Ice, Fire, Earth and Thunder to fight malicious enemies in Elementrees.

If you enter an area, your damage is higher, for instance you can throw devastating fireballs in the fire area.

Switch between elements to optimize your damage to make it alive.

Use the orbs you earned by fighting monsters to keep your trees alive to maintain the elemental balance.

Finally, unlock powerful spells to master the arts of elemental magic.

Our Team :

  • Mathieu SEMIN (@mathieu-semin) : Game Designer - Programmer
  • Lukas MAYER (@lukas-mayer) : Game Designer - UI Artist - Environment Artist - Character Designer
  • Théo WEBER (@millverion) : VFX Artist
  • Valentin CARLUT (@shion-off) : Illustrator
  • Morgane VERNADAT (@morgane) : Character Designer - UI Artist
  • Ulysse JACQUIN (@uly) : Sound designer

Controls :

  • WASD to Move
  • Left click for basic Attack/Interaction
  • Right click for first ability
  • Q for second Ability
  • F for ultimate ability
  • Mouse Wheel to swap between elements
